changeSet.comment: Add Signatera Hold Reasons group and add applicable categories to it
changeSet.sql:
SET SQL_SAFE_UPDATES=0; INSERT INTO `prodlims`.`categorygroup` (`name`, `fordisplay`) VALUES ('Signatera Hold Reasons', 0);
INSERT INTO `prodlims`.`categorygroup_category` SELECT (SELECT id FROM `prodlims`.`categorygroup` WHERE name = 'Signatera Hold Reasons') AS categorygroup_id ,id FROM `prodlims`.`category` WHERE name IN ( 'Identifier Discrepancy', 'Missing Requisition', 'Verify Test Order', 'Verify Clinic', 'Verify patient name order (FN/LN)', 'Billing', 'Other hold reason', 'GENERIC HOLD (enter case note with hold reason)' ); SET SQL_SAFE_UPDATES=1;
